ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen pink lemonade concentrate, thawed
3 fluid ounces lemon-flavored rum (such as Bacardi LimonÂ®)
des: "Delicious but very dangerous cocktail for a group."
ins: Mix pink lemonade concentrate, vodka, rum, lime juice, and sugar substitute together in a pitcher. Add beer slowly; stir gently. Serve over ice.
